channel.title: (Help) Server Not Going Online?
channel.description:
i've created my server, which is a client server not webclient yet. and i seem to join my own server and specifically says its online when i run the source, i port forwarded, used no-ip, i have JDK 6.. but my friend cant join, it tells him error connecting to server.
any reason why its doing this?

item.title: (Help) Server Not Going Online?
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

You can change it client class in the client files depending on the client. It might be in GUI class

Read full topic

item.description:
@God_Father wrote:

I think it was the portforwarding, but to be sure of the ip in the client, whats the specific location of the ip that needs to be replaced? if you may help
